Articles.Content:
please make it so that we can asign a hinge as an airbrake or control surface, and let that be controlled bij sas. 

 

would really help keeping my starship under controll.

The pitch, yaw, roll axis control groups that can be set in the editor are also controlled by SAS.

So if you e.g. add the target angle of a hinge to e.g. the pitch group, then SAS will change the  target angle of said hinge when trying to adjust the pitch. So I guess waht you want is already implemented.
I tested this and it does not work.

I would also like this. It would be nice for helicopters.
